# availableProperties

**Instance Property**

A set of available properties for a provider.

## Declaration

```swift
var availableProperties: Set<CMIOExtensionProperty> { get }
```

## Discussion

Don’t change this property value during the life cycle of the associated provider.

## Configuring Properties

- **providerProperties(forProperties:)**: Gets the state of provider properties.
- **setProviderProperties(_:)**: Set the state of provider properties.
